card_name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Horse Prince
card_text: 1 FIRE Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NWhen this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 FIRE monster from your Deck. After you Synchro Summon this card, you cannot Special Summon Level 5 or higher monsters for the rest of the turn.
